prefix.description: View the bot's prefix or change it.

args.new prefix: New prefix of the bot (max 2 characters)

help.description: Look at all the commands or a specific command usage.

guilds.description: Look at all the servers where the bot is or remove the bot from a server (command only for bot owner).

args.leave: If you want bot leaves a guild

plugins.description: Shows a list of plugins (command only for bot owner).

blacklist.description: Manage blacklisted channels on the guild.

args.channels mentions: Mention the channels you want to manage

emojiinfo.description: Shows informations about a custom emoji.

args.emoji: Custom Emoji of which you want information about

cloneemoji.description: Clones a custom emoji on the guild (you need nitro to run the command).

args.emoji: Custom emoji you want to clone on your server

profile.description: Shows your or a member's information.

args.member: The member whose profile you want

emojis.description: Shows all emojis on the server.

membercount.description: Returns the number of people on the server.

quote.description: Quote a message by sending the message link.

args.message ling: Link of the message whose you want to quote

args.role: A role whose you want information about

search.description: Search for a member in the server, using his name or nick.

args.member information: The name, display name, mention or id of the member

discrim.description: Search for a member in the server, using his discriminator.

args.question: Question whose you want the reply

avatar.description: Sends your or a member's avatar.

args.member: The member whose you want his avatar

args.text: Text that the robot will say

giveaway.description: Creates a giveaway in a channel.

args.time: M for minutes / H for hours / D for days

args.member: Member whose you want change nick
The member whose you want to ban
The ember whose you want to kick

purge.description: Cleans an amount of message in the channel.

args.amount: The amount of messages to delete

massrole.description: Gives or removes a role for everyone.

args.role: The role you want add or removove for everyone

mod-logs.description: Add or remove a logs channel on your server.

args.channel: Channel whose you want to manage

welcome.description: Shows information on automatic join message, you can also simulate a join.

args.simulate: To send a welcome message in welcome channel for you

welcome-channel.description: Add or remove a welcome channel on your server (automatic welcome messages will be sent in this channel).

args.channel: If action is 'add', the channel you want to add

welcome-message.description: Add or remove a welcome message on your server.

args.message: If action is 'add', the message you want to add

leave.description: Shows information on automatic leave message. You can also simulate a leave.

args.simulate: To send a leave message in leave channel for you

leave-channel.description: Add or remove a leave channel on your server (automatic leave messages will be sent in this channel).

args.channel: If action is 'add', the channel you want to add

leave-message.description: Add or remove a leave message on your server.

args.message: If action is 'add', the message you want to add

autorole.description: Add/Remove or look at the autorole set on your server.

args.role: Role you want member have when they join

tickettool.description: Sent or setup the tickettool system.

documentation.description: Link to the online bot documentation.

suggest.description: Suggest something to the bot owners. Suggestions will arrive in our support server.

report.description: Report something to the bot owners. Reports will arrive in our support server.
